author: maxb
msg: Add a new Makefile specific gen-make.py option '--assume-shared-libs'.
If you know what you are doing, and all your Subversion libs will build shared,
you can use this to omit inter-lib dependencies to avoid unnecessary rebuilds.
* gen-make.py (main): Simplify unnecessarily cautious test.
(_usage_exit): Describe new option. Also fix unrelated typo.
(if __name__ == '__main__'): Add option to getopt options list.
* build/generator/gen_make.py
(file scope): Add compatibility definitions for True and False.
(Generator.__init__): Parse option into member variable.
(Generator.write section 'Individual target build rules'):
If option set, omit certain dependencies.

author: maxb
msg: * STATUS: Exchange r16365, r16366 for r16369, dropping existing vote,
adding my own vote.

author: maxb
msg: Fix API NULL-tolerance as per its documentation.
Revealed by crashes in check-swig-pl, check-swig-py.
Patch by: clkao
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.c
(svn_repos_create): Allow fs_config argument to be NULL, as the API promises.

author: maxb
msg: Revert r16365, r16366 (fix svn_repos_create to accept NULL fs_config argument)
in preparation for applying a different fix.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.c
(create_svn_repos_t, svn_repos_create): Revert things.

author: dlr
msg: * STATUS: Nominated r16365/r16366.
